name: Death Sentence
simple_desc: Sets current HP to 50% of Max HP. Deals massive Wind DMG to one enemy and Wind DMG to adjacent targets.
desc:
Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to one enemy equal to #1[i]% of his Max HP plus #5[i]% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to #3[f1]% of his Max HP plus #6[i]% of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at #7[i]% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.
